job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Must be located in Japan!!</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Develop <strong>ML / NLP</strong> applications on top of our core machine learning assets.</li><li>Architect and develop a scalable cloud AI service.</li><li>Application development on machine learning / deep learning assets</li><li>Design and construction of cloud architecture to provide AI services in a scalable manner</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong><em>Minimum Skill / Experience Required requirements</em></strong></p><ul><li>Strong background in Computer Science or a related field</li><li>Extensive experiences in application development</li><li>Working experiences with <strong>AWS or other cloud platforms</strong></li><li>Strong experiences with ML frameworks such as <strong>Scipy / Numpy, Scikit-Learn, Pandas, Tensorflow / Keras / PyTorch</strong></li><li>Good working knowledge of machine learning models (linear regression, ensemble methods, boosting, <strong>RNN, CNN, GCN, GAN, etc</strong>.)</li><li>Experiences with git, <strong>GitHub, CI / CD</strong></li><li>Good communication skill</li><li>Computer&nbsp;science or peripheral background-</li><li>Experience in application development</li><li>Experience in practical development on cloud platforms such as <strong>AWS</strong></li><li>Understanding machine learning frameworks (<strong>Scipy / Numpy, Scikit-Learn, Pandas, Tensorflow / Keras / PyTorch</strong>) </li><li>Sufficient Japanese or English Communication skills</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>** We have many other roles available from our clients, please feel free to share your updated resume and contact us for details.</p>
